
GIT hub --server

for communication with GIThub we want GIT software .

code conflict and code versioning remove 
# below commands are auto generated 
########################################
…or create a new repository on the command line

echo "# ecomm" >> README.md
git init
git add README.md
git commit -m "first commit"
git branch -M main
git remote add origin https://github.com/pravinamrute/ecomm.git
git push -u origin main

#########
explanations of commands
git init--

after excecutions 

Initialized empty Git repository in D:/PYTHON_PROJECTS/GIT_Concepts/.git/


we are initialize project repository






######################################
…or push an existing repository from the command line
git remote add origin https://github.com/pravinamrute/ecomm.git
git branch -M main
git push -u origin main

###################
who will create repository---------manager or company

#url will share for new joiner for work on projects 

example 
https://github.com/pravinamrute/ecomm.git----------this url can be used to join projects


#inside github there is projects structures 


comment --git clone + url

# by giving this command import project structure from github.

in cloning we will get .git folder with other files _---holding reference of original repository

in downloading we canot get . git folder
